title: नहीं, यह वीडियो सिडनी मेट्रो के लिए ‘मेक इन इंडिया’ के तहत बनी ट्रैन का नहीं है
author: www.altnews.in
vclaim:
A Matter of 🇮🇳pride,

 all these trains were MADE IN INDIA!

First time in History- Coaches Made in India being run in a foreign land!

When PM Modi said New India, this is what he meant! pic.twitter.com/oszuqul1rG
